ratings.comment: Amazing teacher and overall very very cool person.
Great as a professor. Stuck in her ways as a linguist.

Great class, great lecturer. She uses a very interactive method of teaching and thrives on debate. One of the most intelligent people I've ever met. You don't need the textbook, but you do have to go to every class though. Tests cover only the basics - no tricks.
Horrible.  Lectures are extremely boring and not at all helpful.  Everything is learned during discussion.

i interest level in this class got lower and lower throughout the semester.  this teacher is AWFUL.  i would NEVER EVER take a class from her again.  she is unorganized, confusing, and generally, i felt more bewildered every time i left her class.  TERRIBLE.

She is a very unorganized, scatter-brained professor.  Her lectures are the same, making them hard to follow. I had to read most textbook chapters both before and after lecture to figure out what in the world she was ever talking about!  I feel as if I learned nothing from her the entire semester!
Easy class, easy to understand, nice TA help, but if u screw up the midterm (35%) bad things can happen.  No online notes is lame.

I left every lecture feeling stupider than I entered.  She was very difficult to understand... however, you did not have to read the book.  If it wasn't for my graduated TA Rebecca Shields, I would not understood very much of anything.

She is a very good lecturer.  You didn't even need to read the book if you went to every lecture.  She was a very good teacher and i felt very good about my knowledge of the material after each lecture.
Great teacher, lectures  are very helpful in understanding  material that may otherwise be confusing
